name: Epic! Creations, Inc.
description: Provider of an online book subscription service intended to offer unlimited access to over 20,000 high-quality books. The company's online book subscription service include curated of read-to-me, audio books and educational videos, enabling children aged 12 and under to instantly discover contents of their interest, read them and share with friends.
